name: Luciana 'Sacrifice' Rosary
description:
The 'Luciana Sacrifice Rosary' is handmade by 'Lisa Black' using the wing of a genuine Papilio Pericles butterfly. 

The delicate butterfly wing is protected and sealed by hand applied resin and mounted on sustainable bamboo.  

Available in 'Black with Black Crystal Rosary' or 'Ivory with wooden Rosary' and presented with a 'Gilded Butterflies' black gift box.
 

*Free International shipping*

name: Ophelia 'Sacrifice' Brooch
description:
The Ophelia 'Sacrifice' Brooch is handmade by 'Lisa Black' using the wing of a genuine Panacea Prola butterfly.

The delicate butterfly wing is protected and sealed by hand applied resin and mounted on sustainable bamboo.

Available in 'Black or 'Ivory' and presented with a 'Gilded Butterflies' black gift box.



*Free International shipping*

name: Luciana
description:
The "Luciana" necklace has the wings of a genuine Papilio Pericles butterfly.

Inspired by the natural movement of butterflies and hinged at the body, the design allows for the pieces to be worn open or closed. The wings are blue and black when worn open and hints of the butterfly can be seen through specially designed holes when worn closed.

The genuine butterfly wings are protected and sealed by hand applied resin and mounted on sustainable bamboo.  

The pendant comes with a 16" gold plated chain with extender and a black gift box.

*Free International shipping*

name: Iris
description:
The "Iris" necklace displays the wings of a genuine Papilio lorquinianus albertsi butterfly.

Inspired by the natural movement of butterflies and hinged at the body, the design allows for the pieces to be worn open or closed. The wings are a mix of aqua, blue, green and black when worn open and hints of the butterfly can be seen through specially designed holes when worn closed.

The genuine butterfly wings are protected and sealed by hand applied resin and mounted on sustainable bamboo.  

The pendant comes with a 16" gold plated chain with extender and a black gift box.


*Free International shipping*

name: Valeria
description:
The Valeria necklace displays the wings of a genuine Phoebis philea butterfly.

Inspired by the natural movement of butterflies and hinged at the body, the design allows for the pieces to be worn open or closed. The wings are yellow and orange and hints of the butterfly can be seen through specially designed holes when worn closed.

The genuine butterfly wings are protected and sealed by hand applied resin and mounted on sustainable bamboo.  

The pendant comes with a 16" gold plated chain with extender and a black gift box.
